caption: Figure 1: An overview of our framework GATEAU. Unlike directly training LLMs with the entire dataset, GATEAU first selects samples enriched with long-range dependency relations by using two proposed methods. Then it uses selected influential samples for training long-context LLMs.
description: The figure illustrates the GATEAU framework, which uses Homologous Models' Guidance and Contextual Awareness Measurement to select influential samples for training long-context LLMs.

caption: Figure 2: Needle in the Haystack test.
description: The figure shows the results of the Needle in the Haystack test, illustrating the model's ability to utilize information from different positions within long contexts of varying lengths in both limited short instruction data settings and real-world settings.
